author: freejobalert.com
title: Anna University Recruitment 2017 – Technical Asst, JRF & Other Posts

organizations.name: m.sc biotechnology/ biochemistry/ zoology/ life sciences for post
centre for climate change and adaptation research
centre for survey training and research
biotechnology/ biochemistry/ molecular biology/ allied life sciences/ osmics science for post
principal investigator department of biotechnology anna
csir major research project department of physics anna university

text: 1. Junior Research Fellow: 04 Posts 2. Research Associate: 02 Posts 3. Technical Assistant: 06 Posts 4. Field Assistant: 01 Post Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Post graduation in Science with NET qualification or Post Graduation in Engineering/ Technology for S.No-1, Ph.D in Science or Post Graduation in Engg/ Technology with 3 years experience with at least one research paper in SCI Journal for S.No-2, B.E (Civil/ Geoinformatics) with 1 year, Diploma (Civil) with 2 years field experience in handling GPS, Total Station and Processing for S.No-3 & SSLC or equivalent with minimum 2 years assisting GPS, Total Station operation work for S.No-4. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: For S.No-1 & 2: Eligible candidates can send their CV along with attested copies of certificates to to “Director, Centre for Climate Change and Adaptation Research, Anna University, Chennai – 600025″ on or before 20-01-2017. For S.No-3 & 4: Eligible candidates may submit their applications to “ The Director, Centre for Survey Training and Research (C-STAR), Institute of Remote Sensing, Anna University, Chennai – 600 025” on or before 10-01-2017. Important Dates: Last Date for Submission of Application for S.No-1 & 2: 20-01-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application for S.No-3 & 4: 10-01-2017. For more details like remuneration, qualification, experience & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt for S.No-3 & 4 Anna University Recruitment 2017 – JRF, Research Scientist & Other Posts: Anna University has invited applications for the recruitment of JRF, Research Scientist, JRF/ SRF/ RA vacancies for different projects on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 19, 21, 25-01-2017. Other details like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… Anna University Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 03 Name of the Posts: 2. Research Scientist: 01 Post 3. JRF/ SRF/ RA: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be below 30 years for Post 1, 28 years for JRF, 32 years for SRF, 35 years for RA for Post 3. Age relaxation is applicable as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess First class in M.E/ M.Tech Biotechnology or First class in M.Sc Biotechnology/ Biochemistry/ Zoology/ Life Sciences for Post 1, PhD in Biotechnology/ Biochemistry/ Molecular Biology/ Allied Life Sciences/ Osmics Science for Post 2, M.Sc., Physics / Materials Science degree with 55% marks & NET/ GATE qualification for JRF, relevant experience for SRF, M.Sc., Ph.D in Physics & relevant experience for Post 3. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview for Post 1, 3, written test, interview for Post 2. How to Apply: For Post 1: Eligible candidates may send their applications along with attested copies of the certificates, testimonials and reference letters to Dr. P. Rajaguru Principal Investigator Department of Biotechnology Anna University-BIT Campus Tiruchirappalli-24, Email: rajaguru62@gmail.com on or before 19-01-2017. For Post 2: Eligible candidates may send their applications along with CV, copy of educational certificates, reprints of publications, experience through post to the Coordinator, BUILDER, Centre for Biotechnology, AC Tech Campus, Anna University, Chennai- 600025, Email: cbtaubuilder@gmail.com on or before 21-01-2017. For Post 3: Eligible candidates may send their curriculum vitae along with the true copies of certificates and research publications by e-mail gvelraj@annauniv.edu/ velrajg@gmail.com or by post to Dr.G.Velraj Associate Professor & Principal Investigator CSIR Major Research Project Department of Physics Anna University, Chennai-25 on or before 25-01-2017. Important Dates: Last Date for Receipt of Applications for Post 1: 19-01-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Applications for Post 2: 21-01-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Applications for Post 3: 25-01-2017. For more details like relaxation, salary & other information click on the link given below…
